1. Updated game engine. Now the game performance sees a huge improvement.

5. If you encounter any problems in Romance Fate, please do not hesitate to contact us via romanceteams@gmail.com

The Billionaire Neighbor

An act of kindness leads you to the new episode of your life, Damian Knight. He's an enigmatic billionaire, a powerful CEO. He's dominant, dark, and protective. He has everything, except the only thing he really wants - you. However, your dark past stands in your way when you're determined to chase love. Can two different worlds manage to get their happy ending ? Will he be your Prince or the Beast of your fairy tale? Make choices and choose your own path.


Roommates with the CEO

When you're about to embrace your dream life - new apartment, new internship, and new life, you find your recently rented apartment a scam! What's worse, you lose your package and wallet! What can you do when you see a housekeeping job posting? Of course, you apply for it! Luckily, you get the job. However, "Three rules. One, never speak of this at work. Two, never enter my room without my permission. Three, I never want to find you under my sheets, naked." You certainly have no intention of breaking his rules – you're in desperate need of a place to stay, and for Killian Knight, a housekeeper at his luxurious penthouse. But it's not as easy as it seems… Can you handle having your CEO as your roommate?


The Sea's Lost Daughter

On a summer trip to a beach house with your friends, an accident sends you crashing into the ocean! When you wake up, you discover that you're a mermaid! Win the heart of the enemy spy, the kind-hearted warrior who rescued you, or your best friend who's had feelings for you for years. Can you use the power of love to overthrow the evil king and save your true home in the sea?

Hello Romance Fate Fans,

To provide you with a better experience, we've included the "Update" section, in which you can check our weekly update schedule of books and chapters. We hope you'll enjoy this function.

1. Added "Category" section in the game.
2. Improved the feature of "Feedback," so we can better assist our players.
3. Fixed some bugs.
4. If you have any questions or encounter problems in the game, please contact us via romanceteams@gmail.com

For this week, we'll release 3 new books, which are Hot and Famous, Whip Him Hard (based on Whipped), and My CEO Student.

Hot and Famous
You’re ready to take your career to new heights when you land an exclusive interview with Hunter Reed, the smoking-hot star of a huge Hollywood franchise, but everything comes crashing down when you find out on live television that your boyfriend Eric is a lying sack of s*it! Instead of throwing in the towel, you decide to re-invent your image and take control of your life by diving head-first into the world of blogging and social media. Will your devoted fans take the leap with you and help you achieve your new dream? And will Hunter Reed, the steamy “Werewolf Detective” steal your heart, or will you find yourself unexpectedly drawn to an old rival? |

Whip Him Hard
You’re an adult toy shop owner by day and a professional dominatrix by night. Nothing excites you more than being in control in the bedroom. That is… until your sexy, loyal Aussie customer comes around…

My CEO Student
When CEO-to-be Bestien Cordon joins your MBA program, you know you’ve finally met your match. Just like you, he’s headstrong and ambitious, but he has you beat in one arena: the bedroom. Will he be the one to make you lose your virginity? As you help him fight for his family business, will you also fight for your love?
